name: cwmsjs
description: CWMS Data API Library for JavaScript/TypeScript created with OpenAPI generator in TypeScript for use with browser webapps
author: USACE,HEC,CWMS,OpenApi Contributors

scripts.build: cd src && npx tsc --outDir dist && cd .. && npm run docs && npm run examples
scripts.buildApi: npm run buildSpec && npm run openapi && cd src && npm run build
scripts.buildSpec: npm run getSpec && npm run modSpec
scripts.clean: shx mkdir -p ./src && shx rm -r ./src && shx mkdir -p ./src/docs && shx rm -r ./src/docs
scripts.link: cd ./src/dist && npm link && cd ../../tests && npm link cwmsjs
